content: k2tog yo k2tog k9 k2tog yo k2tog repeat 11 k7 144 rnds 28-29 k to end 144 round 30 k1 k2tog yo k2tog k8 k2tog yo k2tog repeat 11 k7 132 rnds 31-32 k to end 132 round 33 k2tog yo k2tog k7 k2tog yo k2tog repeat 11 k7 120 round 34 k to end 120 round 35 k119 slip 1 st to rh needle rem m slip 1 st back to lh needle k2tog the beg of a round is moved left round 36 pm yo k2tog k6 k2tog yo k2tog k6 repeat 11 k1 108 round 37 k to end 108 round 38 k to last 2 sts k2tog 107 round 39 yo k2tog k5 k2tog yo k2tog k5 repeat 11 k1 96 round 40 k to end 96 round 41 k to last 2 sts k2 decrease 95 round 42 yo k2tog k4 k2tog yo k2tog k4 repeat 11 k1 84 round 43 k to end 84 round 44 k to last 2 sts k2tog 83 round 45 yo k2tog k3 k2tog yo k2tog k3 repeat 11 k1 72 round 46 k to end 72 round 47 k to last 2 sts k2tog 71 round 48 yo k2tog k2 k2tog yo k2tog k2 repeat 11 k1 60 round 49 k to end 60 round 50 k to last 2 sts k2tog 59 round 51 yo k2tog k1 k2tog yo k2tog k1 repeat 11 k1 48 round 52 k to end 48 round 53 k to last 2 sts k2tog 47 round 54 k2 k2tog k2 repeat 11 k1 36 round 55 k to end 36 round 56 k2tog repeat 18 18 4 round 57 k2tog repeat 9 9 round 58 k1 k2tog repeat 3 6 finishing pull tight & fasten_off hand wash in lukewarm water block to measurements and dry flat enjoy for advanced beginners follow this pattern for any size 1 check your gauge for knitting in the round projects g number of sts in 10cm 2 measure the head circumference hc 3 count the number of sts n to cover your hc n sts = hc cm * g sts / 10 cm cast on n sts check if multiple 12 + 1 st to join in the round work 12 sections with yo lace stitch pattern as an example use the written directions above anyway feel free to ask questions via dm or email @wild pear tm@gmail com sincerely yours katherine ♡ this pattern may be printed and used for personal non-commercial use only either text or any part of it including tables photos may not be copied reproduced or distributed tag your projects made with this pattern #vintagevibes_beret in instagram thank you 5
